title: ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData.TangentPropagation
description: Gets or sets whether to apply the weld bead to all edges that are tangent to the selected faces or edges.
returns: True to apply the weld bead to all edges that are tangent to the selected faces or edges, false to not (see Remarks )
remarks:
If this property is...
Then use...
True
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::FromToLength
to enable the from/to length properties
False
ICosmeticWeldBeadFeatureData::Side
to define how to apply the weld bead to the selected faces or edges
